intro: Psychotria didymocarpos, commonly known as the red-eyed wonder, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and striking red flowers that bloom in clusters. It produces small, elliptical berries that are typically red when mature. Psychotria didymocarpos is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant floral display.
